openGraph.title: MultiLive
openGraph.description:
MultiLive is a service that allows you to simultaneously watch broadcasts on Twitch, YouTube, Chzzk, Soop, Kick.
On each broadcast platform, you can access broadcasts based on the channel's unique ID or the streamer's ID.

title: MultiLive
description:
MultiLive is a service that allows you to watch broadcasts from multiple platforms simultaneously.
On each broadcast platform, you can access the broadcast based on the channel's unique ID or the streamer's ID.

To use: Select a platform from the popup below, enter the ID of the broadcast and click the Add button.
Alternatively, you can enter the URL directly.
You can watch up to four broadcasts simultaneously, and when you're done, close the popup and start watching.

How to find your broadcast ID:
https://www.twitch.tv/{id} -> t:{id},
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v={id} -> y:{id},
https://chzzk.naver.com/live/{id} -> c:{id},
https://play.sooplive.co.kr/{id}/ -> s:{id},
https://kick.com/{id} -> k:{id}
input-placeholder: Enter the ID of the live broadcast.
